name: Space Stellar
description:
SPACE STELLAR

Join this space adventure, where you cand find action and entertainment

In this game you will take the role of a pilot with his ship (Dave) and you will face a very big threat. Your job is to contain the largest group of enemies you can so you can give your people enough time to create a way to save themselves.

YOUR SACRIFICE WILL NOT BE IN VAIN

Game created for the Boundless Game Jam

CONTROLS

Press "H" to go up and release to go down

You will shoot automatically

ITEMNS

There are some items that can help you in your mission 

  • The Hourglass makes time go slower
  • The Shield gives you a shield ??? well i dont think i need to explain what a shield does...
  • And the heart heals you <3

So yes, thats the game and I apologize if there is any bug or something is wierd

it´s the first game I made and it´s the first time I use itchio.

I hope you enjoy the game :D
